title: Fund-Digital Signal Proc
description: Introduction to digital signal processing. Sampling theorem, discrete-time Fourier transform. Power spectrum, discrete Fourier transform and the FFT algorithm, Z-transform, digital filter design and implementation.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 2026 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3077 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
